original: @217b ` // so sor 'brang ma'i 'khor lo bri ba'i thabs bzhugs /
analyzed: @217b ` // so sor 'brang ma'i 'khor lo bri ba'i thabs bzhugs /
translated: The method of drawing the protection wheel

original: # // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: # // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: Homage to the noble Mañjuśrī, the youthful one.🔽I bow to the protection wheel

original: / sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon bstod pa'i //🔽so sor 'brang ma la btud de //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon bstod pa'i // so sor 'brang ma la btud de //
translated: praised by all the buddhas,

original: sems can kun la bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can kun la bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to protect all sentient beings,

original: de yi 'khor lo bdag gis bri //
analyzed: de yi 'khor lo bdag gis bri //
translated: I will draw its wheel.

original: gtsang zhing shin tu mnyam par bzhag par gyur pas /
analyzed: gtsang zhing shin tu mnyam par bzhag par gyur pas /
translated: Having become pure and well-equipoised,

original: gtor ma la sogs pa byin la /
analyzed: gtor ma la sogs pa byin la /
translated: offerings and so forth should be given.

original: khu tshur bcas pa'i khru gang gi tshad kyi ras la sogs pa la bri bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: khu tshur bcas pa'i khru gang gi tshad kyi ras la sogs pa la bri bar bya ba ni /
translated: On cloth and so forth, the size of a cubit with the fist extended, one should draw:

original: dang por re zhig sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la /
analyzed: dang por re zhig sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la /
translated: First, having made a single level with the measure of four finger lengths,

original: de'i dbus su zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa'i h'um brgyad kyis bskor ba'i yi ge pram de'i dbus su sngags aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re che ge mo raksha raksha pushtim sh'intam ku ru h'um h'um phat @218a * //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa'i h'um brgyad kyis bskor ba'i yi ge pram de'i dbus su sngags aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti s'a re che ge mo raksha raksha pushtim sh'intam ku ru h'um h'um phat @218a * //
translated: in its center, the syllable pram surrounded by eight half-moons adorned with hūṃs. In its center, the mantra: oṃ maṇi-dhāri vajrīni mahā-prati-sāra rakṣa rakṣa pūṣṭiṃ śāntiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Phaṭ svāhā.

original: de'i phyi rol du sor phyed kyi tshad kyi rim pa gnyis byas la /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du sor phyed kyi tshad kyi rim pa gnyis byas la /
translated: Outside of that, make two layers with a width of half a finger.

original: de'i rim pa dang po la aom ma ni dha ri badzri na mi h'a pra ti s'a re che ge mo raksha raksha pushtim sh'antim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat /
analyzed: de'i rim pa dang po la aom ma ni dha ri badzri na mi h'a pra ti s'a re che ge mo raksha raksha pushtim sh'antim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat /
translated: On the first layer, write: Oṃ maṇi-dhara vajrīnāminī hā prati-sāre such-and-such rakṣa rakṣa puṣṭi śāntiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ.

original: de bzhin du byas la lan gnyis yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du byas la lan gnyis yang ngo //
translated: Do it in the same way, but twice.

original: rim pa gnyis pa la yang de bzhin du'o ;
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa la yang de bzhin du'o ;
translated: On the second layer, do it in the same way.

original: / de'i phyi rol du sor gsum gyi tshad la ni rim pa gcig byas la /
analyzed: / de'i phyi rol du sor gsum gyi tshad la ni rim pa gcig byas la /
translated: Outside of that, make one layer with a width of three fingers.

original: de'i phyogs bzhir ri mo gnyis pa'i padma 'dab ma bzhi pa /
analyzed: de'i phyogs bzhir ri mo gnyis pa'i padma 'dab ma bzhi pa /
translated: In the four directions, make a four-petaled lotus with two lines.

original: shar la sogs pa'i rim gyi ri mo gnyis kyi mtshams su sngags /
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i rim gyi ri mo gnyis kyi mtshams su sngags /
translated: In the east and so on, in the spaces between the two lines, write the mantras:

original: aom bi ma le bi bu le dza ya wa re aa mri ta che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bi ma le bi bu le dza ya wa re aa mri ta che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vimalavibhūjati-varā-amṛta such-and-such śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣa rakṣa kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gnyis pa la /
analyzed: gnyis pa la /
translated: On the second layer,

original: aom aa mri te bi lo ki ni garbha sam raksha ni che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa mri te bi lo ki ni garbha sam raksha ni che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ amṛte vilokinī garbha saṃrakṣaṇi such-and-such śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣa rakṣa kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gsum pa la /
analyzed: gsum pa la /
translated: For the third,

original: aom bh'a ra bh'a ra sam bh'a ra aindra ya ba la bi sho dha ne che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bh'a ra bh'a ra sam bh'a ra aindra ya ba la bi sho dha ne che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ bhāra bhāra saṃbhāra indrayavālab viśodhani such-and-such śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: bzhi pa la /
analyzed: bzhi pa la /
translated: For the fourth,

original: aom aa mri te dha ra wa ra bi shuddha che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa mri te dha ra wa ra bi shuddha che ge mo sh'antim pushtim raksha raksha ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ amṛte dharavāravīśuddhā such-and-such śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣa rakṣa kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzhi la /
analyzed: mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzhi la /
translated: In the four intermediate directions, there are four three-tined vajras.

original: de'i rtse mo dbus ma bzhi la /
analyzed: de'i rtse mo dbus ma bzhi la /
translated: On the four central tips of those,

original: me'i phyogs la sogs par rim gyis sngags /
analyzed: me'i phyogs la sogs par rim gyis sngags /
translated: the mantras are in sequence in the fire direction and so on.

original: aom bi spho ta badzri ni che ge mo raksha raksha sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bi spho ta badzri ni che ge mo raksha raksha sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ viṣphoṭa vajrīṇi such-and-such rakṣa rakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gnyis pa la /
analyzed: gnyis pa la /
translated: For the second,

original: aom aa mri te dha ra che ge mo raksha raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa mri te dha ra che ge mo raksha raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ amṛte dhāra, protect so-and-so, protect! Bring about peace and prosperity, hūṃ hūṃ! Phaṭ phaṭ! Svāhā!

original: gsum pa la /
analyzed: gsum pa la /
translated: For the third,

original: aom bi ma le che ge mo raksha raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bi ma le che ge mo raksha raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vimale, protect so-and-so, protect! Bring about peace and prosperity, hūṃ hūṃ! Phaṭ phaṭ! Svāhā!

original: bzhi pa la /
analyzed: bzhi pa la /
translated: For the fourth,

original: aom dza ya wa re che ge mo rakta raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dza ya wa re che ge mo rakta raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ jayavare, protect so-and-so, protect! Bring about peace and prosperity, hūṃ hūṃ! Phaṭ phaṭ! Svāhā!

original: padma'i 'dab ma dang rdo rje dag gi bar du me la sogs kyi rim pas sngags /
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma dang rdo rje dag gi bar du me la sogs kyi rim pas sngags /
translated: In between the lotus petals and the vajras, the mantras are written in the order of fire and so forth.

original: aom ni sum bha badzra ni che ge mo raksha raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ni sum bha badzra ni che ge mo raksha raksha sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ nisumbha vajra, protect so-and-so, protect! Bring about peace and prosperity, hūṃ hūṃ! Phaṭ phaṭ! Svāhā!

original: de bzhin brgyad pa'i bar du sngags 'di bri'o //
analyzed: de bzhin brgyad pa'i bar du sngags 'di bri'o //
translated: This mantra is written up to the eighth.

original: de'i phyi rol du sor phyed pa'i tshad kyi rim pa bzhi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du sor phyed pa'i tshad kyi rim pa bzhi bya'o //
translated: Outside of that, four steps of half a finger should be made.

original: de la rim pa dang po la yi ge hri nyi shu rtsa lnga phreng du bya'o //
analyzed: de la rim pa dang po la yi ge hri nyi shu rtsa lnga phreng du bya'o //
translated: On the first step, twenty-five hṛīs should be arranged in a line.

original: rim pa gnyis pa la /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa la /
translated: On the second step,

original: aom aa pa r'a dzi ta ma h'a de bi trat /🔽aom k'a la karni kram dha li /🔽aom padma kunda li pam /🔽aom pushta danti ni h'um /🔽aom ma lyam ku shi h'um /🔽aom badzra shrim kha le h'um /🔽aom ma h'a shve te h'um /🔽aom ma h'a k'a li hr'i:/🔽aom g'u ti tu ta /🔽aom badzra k'a li hr'i:/🔽aom badzra p'a shi kri ta hri /🔽aom badzra p'a shi bhri ta /🔽aom badzra p'a ni ma t'a ba li dhi /🔽aom badzra m'a le mam /🔽aom aa mri ta kunda li sv'a h'a /🔽@218b aom dzva la dzva la h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa pa r'a dzi ta ma h'a de bi trat / aom k'a la karni kram dha li / aom padma kunda li pam / aom pushta danti ni h'um / aom ma lyam ku shi h'um / aom badzra shrim kha le h'um / aom ma h'a shve te h'um / aom ma h'a k'a li hr'i:/ aom g'u ti tu ta / aom badzra k'a li hr'i:/ aom badzra p'a shi kri ta hri / aom badzra p'a shi bhri ta / aom badzra p'a ni ma t'a ba li dhi / aom badzra m'a le mam / aom aa mri ta kunda li sv'a h'a / @218b aom dzva la dzva la h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ aparājita mahādevi trāt🔽Oṃ kālakarṇikrama dhalī🔽Oṃ padma kunḍalī paṃ🔽Oṃ puṣṭadantini hūṃ🔽Oṃ mañju kuśi hūṃ🔽Oṃ vajra śṛṅkhalā hūṃ🔽Oṃ mahāśvetā hūṃ🔽Oṃ mahākālī hrīḥ🔽Oṃ gaurī tuṭa🔽Oṃ vajra kālī hrīḥ🔽Oṃ vajra pāśa kṛta hrīḥ🔽Oṃ vajra pāśa bhṛta🔽Oṃ vajra pāṇi mātaṅgavaladhidhi🔽Oṃ vajra māle maṃ🔽Oṃ amṛtakuṇḍali svāhā🔽Oṃ jvala jvala hūṃ phaṭ svāhā🔽

original: aom takki h'um dza: sv'a h'a /🔽rim pa gsum la aom badzra hr'i:/🔽aom su barna ke shi kri ta /🔽aom pi gam le lam /🔽aom bi tyungma li dza: h'um /🔽aom sh'antim h'um /🔽aom pushtim ba la brda ni ha /🔽aom sum bha ka ri h'um /🔽aom ma ni dha ri h'um /
analyzed: aom takki h'um dza: sv'a h'a /🔽rim pa gsum la aom badzra hr'i:/🔽aom su barna ke shi kri ta /🔽aom pi gam le lam /🔽aom bi tyungma li dza: h'um /🔽aom sh'antim h'um /🔽aom pushtim ba la brda ni ha /🔽aom sum bha ka ri h'um /🔽aom ma ni dha ri h'um /
translated: Oṃ takki hūṃ jaḥ svāhā.🔽For the three stages, oṃ vajra hrīḥ.🔽Oṃ suvarṇa keśi kṛta.🔽Oṃ piṅgale laṃ.🔽Oṃ vitunmali jaḥ hūṃ.🔽Oṃ śāntiṃ hūṃ.🔽Oṃ puṣṭimbala barda ni ha.🔽Oṃ subhakari hūṃ.🔽Oṃ maṇidhari hūṃ.🔽

original: aom ratna m'a la dha ri hr'i:/🔽aom ma h'a pra ti s'a re pram /🔽aom dhu ru dhu ru /🔽mu ru mu ru /🔽ku ru ku ru h'um h'um /🔽aom ba la bardha ni yo ha /🔽aom ru ru tsa le h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /🔽aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti sa re che ge mo raksha raksha ku ru /🔽aom a'a: h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /🔽rim pa bzhi ba la /🔽aom t'a re t'am /🔽aom aa raksha sye ka dza ti dzny'am /🔽aom bu ddha ka ri te he h'um /🔽aom ka p'a li me aom lam ke shva ri kham /🔽aom dha n+ya lam ki shi / aom lam ki shva ri mum /🔽aom ha ri tyee ham ksham /🔽aom panytsi ke kre / aom li khe sam dushta /🔽aom danti ni ku ta /🔽aom shri ya de bi shr'i /🔽aom sva ra sva ti bam /
analyzed: aom ratna m'a la dha ri hr'i:/ aom ma h'a pra ti s'a re pram / aom dhu ru dhu ru / mu ru mu ru / ku ru ku ru h'um h'um / aom ba la bardha ni yo ha / aom ru ru tsa le h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a / aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti sa re che ge mo raksha raksha ku ru / aom a'a: h'um phat phat sv'a h'a / rim pa bzhi ba la / aom t'a re t'am / aom aa raksha sye ka dza ti dzny'am / aom bu ddha ka ri te he h'um / aom ka p'a li me aom lam ke shva ri kham / aom dha n+ya lam ki shi / aom lam ki shva ri mum / aom ha ri tyee ham ksham / aom panytsi ke kre / aom li khe sam dushta / aom danti ni ku ta / aom shri ya de bi shr'i / aom sva ra sva ti bam /
translated: Oṃ ratna-mālā-dhari hriḥ🔽Oṃ mahā-prati-sāre praṃ🔽Oṃ dhuru dhuru🔽mururu mururu🔽kururu kururu hūṃ hūṃ🔽Oṃ balavardhani yo ha🔽Oṃ ruru-ca-le hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā🔽Oṃ maṇi-dhari vajrīṇi mahā-prati-sāre such-and-such rakṣa rakṣa kuru🔽Oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā🔽In the fourth sequence:🔽Oṃ tāre tāṃ🔽Oṃ rakṣa-syaka-jāti-jñāṃ🔽Oṃ buddhakārite he hūṃ🔽Oṃ kapālini me oṃ laṃkeśvari khaṃ🔽Oṃ dhanvalaṃkīṣi oṃ laṃkeśvari muṃ🔽Oṃ hārītyai haṃ kṣaṃ🔽Oṃ pañcikī tre🔽Oṃ liṅke saṃ duṣṭa🔽Oṃ danti ni kuṭa🔽Oṃ śriya-devī śrī🔽Oṃ sarasvatī vaṃ🔽

original: aom raksha raksha che ge mo sarba bha ye bhya bam /
analyzed: aom raksha raksha che ge mo sarba bha ye bhya bam /
translated: Oṃ rakṣa rakṣa so-and-so from all fears.🔽

original: aom di ba padme mam /
analyzed: aom di ba padme mam /
translated: Oṃ divapadmim.

original: aom mani dha ri badzra ni m'a ma k'i mam /
analyzed: aom mani dha ri badzra ni m'a ma k'i mam /
translated: Oṃ manidhari vajranimāmakīm.

original: aom bhri ku ti bhram bhr'im bhr'um aa /
analyzed: aom bhri ku ti bhram bhr'im bhr'um aa /
translated: Oṃ bhṛkuṭibhrūṃ bhrīṃ bhruṃ a.

original: de'i phyi rol du sor gnyis tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du sor gnyis tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la /
translated: Outside of that, make a single tier two fingerbreadths wide.

original: der rdo rje gyen du bltas pa sum cu rtsa gnyis bris la /
analyzed: der rdo rje gyen du bltas pa sum cu rtsa gnyis bris la /
translated: There, draw thirty-two upright vajras.

original: rdo rje gnyis kyi mtshams su nub phyogs nas rim gyis pushpa /
analyzed: rdo rje gnyis kyi mtshams su nub phyogs nas rim gyis pushpa /
translated: In the spaces between the vajras, starting from the west, are puṣpe,

original: liksham kshim bhr'um /
analyzed: liksham kshim bhr'um /
translated: likṣaṃ kṣiṃ bhruṃ,

original: ai bhr'um / ham /
analyzed: ai bhr'um / ham /
translated: iva bhruṃ haṃ,

original: ka kham / ha bam /🔽hri dza ham /
analyzed: ka kham / ha bam / hri dza ham /
translated: ka khaṃ ha vaṃ,🔽hrīḥ ja haṃ,

original: hri ri / h'um li /🔽hi su / h'um dza /
analyzed: hri ri / h'um li / hi su / h'um dza /
translated: hrīḥ ri ha li,🔽hi su ha ja,

original: bam su / ho h'um /
analyzed: bam su / ho h'um /
translated: vaṃ su ho hūṃ,

original: aom phat / dzam sma /
analyzed: aom phat / dzam sma /
translated: oṃ phaṭ jaṃ saṃ,

original: kam bam / aam /
analyzed: kam bam / aam /
translated: ka vaṃ aṃ,

original: sum / aom /
analyzed: sum / aom /
translated: suṃ oṃ,

original: bham / bam /
analyzed: bham / bam /
translated: bhaṃ vaṃ,

original: aom / trim /
analyzed: aom / trim /
translated: oṃ triṃ,

original: kshim / dhi /
analyzed: kshim / dhi /
translated: kṣiṃ dhi,

original: sham // dzam rum /
analyzed: sham // dzam rum /
translated: śaṃ ja ruṃ,

original: rum / aom /
analyzed: rum / aom /
translated: ruṃ oṃ,🔽saṃ.

original: sam / de'i phyi rol du sor gnyis kyi tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la /
analyzed: sam / de'i phyi rol du sor gnyis kyi tshad kyi rim pa gcig byas la /
translated: Outside of that, make a single tier two fingerbreadths wide.

original: der sdong bu gos dang ras kyis dkris pa'i padma kha phye ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bris la /
analyzed: der sdong bu gos dang ras kyis dkris pa'i padma kha phye ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bris la /
translated: There, draw forty-two open lotus flowers wrapped in cloth and silk.

original: der nub phyogs nas rim gyis padma kha phye ba'i steng du rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / rdo rje rtse gsum dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri rin po che'i myu gu dang /🔽rtse gsum dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / dung dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / rtse gsum dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / mda' gzhu dang / rin po che'i snye ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: der nub phyogs nas rim gyis padma kha phye ba'i steng du rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / rdo rje rtse gsum dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri rin po che'i myu gu dang / rtse gsum dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / dung dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / rtse gsum dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / mda' gzhu dang / rin po che'i snye ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: In the west, a vajra, sword, goad, three-pronged vajra, battle-ax, vajra noose, conch, wheel, sword, jewel sprout,🔽three-pronged vajra, wheel, vajra, battle-ax, conch, sword, goad, three-pronged vajra, vajra noose, bow and arrow, jewel tassel, and victory banner.

original: dung dang / rtse gsum dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rgyal mtshan dang / mda' gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / mda' gzhu dang / rgyal @219a * //

original: mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rin po che'i za ma tog gi mtshan ma shin tu gsal ba bri'o //
analyzed: mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rin po che'i za ma tog gi mtshan ma shin tu gsal ba bri'o //
translated: The signs of the vajra, the vajra noose, the vajra hook, the wheel, the trident, the conch, the vajra lasso, and the precious casket should be drawn very clearly.

original: dge ba 'dod pas mtshon cha thams cad rtse mo phyir bstan pa bri'o //
analyzed: dge ba 'dod pas mtshon cha thams cad rtse mo phyir bstan pa bri'o //
translated: One who desires virtue should draw all weapons with their points turned inward.

original: ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bris pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bris pa yin no //
translated: It is drawn just as it is seen.
